correctness.rationale: Multiple factual errors, inconsistencies with the article, and at least one schema violation are present. Key issues: (1) Co-reactant selection: Set to N2O plasma for all subcycles, but the device metrics used (μFE=106.5 cm2/Vs; SS=113.5 mV/dec; VTH=-0.47 V per Table 1) correspond to the selective Ga2O3 N2O case (IG*ZO), where In2O3 and ZnO use O2 plasma. Update coReactant to O2 for In2O3 and ZnO and N2O for Ga2O3 (or change device metrics to match the all-N2O case). (2) Dosing/purge time units: Schema requires MilliSEC; article reports seconds. Values were copied as seconds but labeled MilliSEC (e.g., DADI 1.5 s given as 1.5 ms; purge 25 s as 25 ms; plasma exposure 1–5 s not reflected). Convert to ms correctly (e.g., 1.5 s→1500 ms; 25 s→25000 ms; 10 s stabilize→10000 ms; co-reactant exposure 1 s and 5 s→1000 and 5000 ms) and include both O2 and N2O exposures where relevant. (3) Film thickness and cycles: IGZO active layer is 10 nm (device section), but thicknessControl.filmThickness is 20 nm and numberofCycles=20 (not reported). Correct filmThickness to 10 nm and remove/justify numberofCycles with traceable data. (4) Schema violation: An extra processParameters.filmThickness is included while additionalProperties is false; remove it (filmThickness should only be under thicknessControl). (5) Device properties inconsistency: VTH -1.41 V (O2 reference) is mixed with μFE 106.5 cm2/Vs and SS 113.5 mV/dec (IG*ZO with N2O on Ga2O3, 5 s). Use a single, coherent split and plasma condition for all device metrics (e.g., IG*ZO N2O 5 s: VTH≈-0.47 V; μFE≈106.5; SS≈113.5; hysteresis≈0.05 V). On/off ratio (1e7) is not reported; remove unless traceable. (6) MaterialProperties.electricalProperties: Marked “Hall measurements” and gives mobility/resistivity/carrier density for IGZO, but the article provides Hall data only for In2O3 and ZnO, not IGZO; and the 106.5 value is a field-effect mobility from TFTs, not Hall. Remove or correct the characterizationMethod and values to be traceable, or omit if not provided. (7) GrowthPerCycle, saturation, nucleationPeriod, flowRates, uniformity, conformality, roughness value, filmDensity, optical refractive index and absorption values are not reported; they appear fabricated. Remove or mark as unavailable; only include traceable values (bandgap numbers are shown for single oxides, not the IGZO film). (8) Film composition: Elemental concentration lists a single 71.2% value; include Ga (7.8%) and Zn (21.0%) from Table S3, and keep the atomic ratio consistent (In:Ga:Zn ≈ 1:0.11:0.30 is acceptable). (9) Substrate: For the IGZO TFT deposition, the relevant substrate is a thermally grown 100 nm SiO2 buffer on Si; the current value (“low-boron-doped polished Si wafer”) pertains to single-oxide film depositions. Use the substrate appropriate to the represented process. After correcting these issues, the extraction will better align with the article and the schema.

completeness.rationale: Major incompleteness and inconsistencies vs. the article and the schema. (1) Multiple processes are described in the paper (reference O2-only, N2O-all at 1 s and 5 s, and three selective N2O splits each at 1 s and 5 s; total ≥9 distinct IGZO ALD conditions), but only one process instance is extracted. (2) Co-reactant selection is incorrect: extraction uses N2O for In2O3, Ga2O3, and ZnO, whereas the article specifies O2 for the reference and selective use of N2O per cation; exposure times (1 s, 5 s) are a key variable and are not captured per process. (3) Timing units are wrong: purge/dose times are given in milliseconds; the article reports seconds (e.g., purge 25 s, reactant stabilize 10 s, plasma exposure 1 or 5 s). (4) Film thickness is set to 20 nm, but the device IGZO layer is 10 nm; number of cycles and GPC are not reported but are filled with unsupported values. (5) Many properties are untraceable or fabricated (flow rates, refractive index, absorption coefficient, band gap for IGZO, resistivity, carrier density, uniformity, conformality, film density, saturation, nucleation period). (6) Device metrics are incoherent: mobility 106.5 cm2/V·s and SS 113.5 mV/dec belong to IG*ZO (Ga2O3 N2O, 5 s), but the threshold voltage reported (-1.41 V) is from the O2 reference; fields must be consistent within a single process. (7) Composition reporting is incomplete (only one 71.2% value under elementalConcentration; should list In, Ga, Zn; atomic ratio is OK). To improve, add separate process instances for each reported condition with correct co-reactant per subcycle and exposure time, correct units (s), correct 10 nm film thickness, remove or source all material/device properties, and provide full elemental concentrations.
